attributes.action: Call a general election for the good of our country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current Prime Minister and Government are displaying gross incompetence in the running of our country and should now call a General Election to enable the people to choose whether they feel this Government is right for this country.  Otherwise we can safely assume that the Government are happy about the way they are destroying our children's heritage and will carry on for another two years with no mandate.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
